value.title: StarCraft 2: Can MaxPax OUTSMART Dark?! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of professional StarCraft 2 between Dark and MaxPax. MaxPax likes to play a relatively cheesy style of Zerg versus Protoss, but Dark is very good when it comes to not losing to stupid stuff.
